result.description: A Beautiful Mind tells the life story of John Nash, a Nobel Prize winner who struggled through most of his adult life with schizophrenia. Directed by Ron Howard, this becomes a tale not only of one man's battle to overcome his own disability, but of the overreaching power of love - a theme that has been shown by many films that you enjoy.

If you haven't watched the movie yet, go watch it and return to this quiz!

result.ques: What did William Parcher ask Nash to do to help his country?
options: Spy on professors at the university
